# Chase.md

> AI-powered document chasing for UK accountancy practices.

Chase.md automates the repetitive process of requesting, following up on, and collecting documents from clients. It replaces the manual cycle of emails, calls, and reminders with intelligent multi-channel campaigns.

## What it does

- Sends automated document requests via email, SMS, and WhatsApp
- Escalates through configurable schedules (gentle reminder → firm → urgent)
- Provides clients with a magic link portal — no login, no password, no app download
- AI classifies uploaded documents and flags mismatches
- Syncs documents and client data with Xero
- Tracks progress in a real-time dashboard

## Key features

- Multi-channel escalation (Email → SMS → WhatsApp)
- Magic link client portal (zero-friction document upload)
- AI document classification (powered by Claude)
- Xero integration (client sync + document filing)
- Campaign management (bulk document requests)
- Live progress dashboard
- GDPR compliant (UK data residency, consent tracking, data export/erasure)
- Bank-grade security (AES-256 encryption, TLS 1.3)

## Who it's for

UK accountancy practices spending hundreds of hours per year chasing clients for tax documents, bank statements, ID verification, and other compliance paperwork.
